subject: p12952223
History: Urosepsis, chronic heart failure, pulmonary edema. Evaluation for interval change.
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is improvement of ventilation, as reflected by decrease in extent of the parenchymal opacities. At the lung bases, the opacities, however, are still evident. Moderate cardiomegaly, mild fluid overload, no pneumothorax.
